hero.title: <highlight>Share</highlight> who you are, what you do, and where you're going – <highlight>faster and more efficiently</highlight> than ever before.
hero.subtitle: Whether you are an individual building your personal brand or a company looking to <highlight>effectively</highlight> present your team – <highlight>QuickPass helps you</highlight> share everything important and always up to date.

whyUs.stepForward: Are you hesitating whether it's time to take a step forward?
whyUs.title: Why QuickPass?
whyUs.desc: Our modern platform combines the benefits of a digital business card and a link-in-bio hub. It allows you to easily “QuickPass” contacts, links, projects, and your personal brand – online via a link or in person with an elegant NFC card.

onePlace.title: Everything in one place
onePlace.desc: Contacts, social networks, websites, and projects – clear, stylish, and always up to date.

sharing.title: Sharing in seconds
sharing.desc: Just tap the card or send a link. No delays, no apps.

style.title: Your style, your impression
style.desc: Visually customizable profile and card that reflect your personality and professionalism.

card.title: Elegant NFC business card
card.subtitle: Quality workmanship that leaves an impression.
card.desc: Made from quality wood, custom engraved with selected elegance – lightly finished to highlight the natural grain and smooth surface.

premium.title: Premium workmanship
premium.desc: Engraved in detail, each piece is unique. Fineness, precision, style.

sharing.title: Lightning-fast sharing
sharing.desc: Tap/scan – no apps, no delays. Instantly shared information.

nfc.title: Get your NFC card today!
nfc.desc: Experience seamless sharing with our NFC card - order now and elevate your networking game!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Find answers to your questions about our NFC card and its features.
faq.help: We are here to help you!

whatIsNfc.question: What is NFC and how does it work?
whatIsNfc.answer: NFC (Near Field Communication) is a technology that enables wireless data transfer over a very short distance – just bring the devices close together and a connection is made within a second. It is used, for example, in contactless payments, building access, or modern sharing of contacts via smart business cards.

whatDevicesItSupports.question: Which devices support NFC?
whatDevicesItSupports.answer: Most modern smartphones support NFC today, including: iPhones (models from iPhone 7 and up) Location: The NFC antenna is usually on the back of the phone, often at the top or in the middle. Android phones (Samsung, Google Pixel, Xiaomi, Huawei, and others) Location: The NFC antenna is usually on the back of the device, mostly at the top or in the middle. Smartwatches (e.g., Apple Watch, Samsung Galaxy Watch)

isAppNeeded.question: Is an app required?
isAppNeeded.answer: No, you don't need any app to read the NFC business card. QuickPass works seamlessly on any smartphone with NFC support.

isItFree.question: Is QuickPass free?
isItFree.answer: Yes, anyone can use a QuickPass account completely free. See the “pricing” section for a comparison of membership benefits.

delivery.question: How does delivery work?
delivery.answer: All NFC products come pre-programmed with a link to your digital profile. Goods are shipped via Zásilkovna. Orders are handed over to the carrier within 24 hours. Delivery in CZ/SK within 7 business days.

About.title: Why work with us and who are we?
About.subtitle: Explain what your company is working on and what value you provide to your customers.

story.subtitle: Our story
story.title: Tells you about our story and mission
story.desc: We are a company specializing in modern digital business cards. We offer a unique solution connecting physical business cards with the digital world – our cards contain an NFC chip or QR code that allows instant access to your contact information, websites, or social media profiles. Simple, practical, and elegant – the future of business cards is here!

FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.desc: Here you will find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our NFC cards, their use, and possibilities. If you do not find the answer to your question, do not hesitate to contact us.
